rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming open space designed to set the tone for the Colonial style. It includes a reception area with appropriate lighting and storage solutions.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area styled in Colonial aesthetics, featuring comfortable seating arrangements, decorative elements and ample natural light. Vastu principles ensure that the living room faces the east or north for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a formal dining table and colonial-style decor. Vastu considerations ensure proper placement relative to other spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional, modern kitchen integrated with traditional colonial design elements. Includes provisions for servant's quarters connectivity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A large bedroom with a colonial aesthetic, incorporating ample storage and a private ensuite bathroom. The room is designed to face the east as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom styled in Colonial design with modern comforts and an attached en-suite bathroom. Placed in alignment with Vastu principles for harmonious energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Separate area dedicated to the domestic help, including a small living space and personal storage. Designed as per local norms ensuring privacy and efficiency.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Dedicated space for storage of cleaning supplies, additional kitchen utilities and small home office space. Complies with Vastu guidelines by being positioned away from the main entrance.

openings.description: Large entry door with colonial detailing.

openings.location: Living room, dining area and bedrooms
openings.description: Double glazed windows placed strategically for natural lighting and ventilation while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Provides a seamless transition between interior and exterior spaces.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Well-designed bedroom with colonial finishes, natural lighting through east facing windows and storage solutions.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom styled similarly to bedroom 1, ensuring comfort and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Private balcony adjoining one of the bedrooms offering a view of the surrounding area. Designed to provide outdoor space without compromising privacy.

openings.description: Well-built staircase in colonial style providing safe and aesthetic transition.
Large windows ensuring ample daylight into the balcony area.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive colonial styled terrace featuring a mix of seating areas, greenery and a built-in barbeque zone. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by aligning the terrace towards favorable directions.

openings.location: Leading from first floor to rooftop terrace
openings.description: Sturdy door that connects the interior spaces with the outdoor terrace.
Natural light enhancing the ambiance of the rooftop area.
